title: Biometric Smart Card Integration
description: There is a disconnect between the physical and digital world. Mobile credentials are still weak in areas, while some may not have phones.
solution: A biometric smart card is easy-to-use and allows the owner full control of personal biometric data, identity, and access management.
experience: Our engineers designed and deployed security systems for the legacy banking systems; NCR/AT&T (Bell Labs) and Citibank ATM OLTP system.
